attributes.action: Speed camera’s in Norton Road, Norton, Letchworth Garden City, Hertfordshire.
attributes.additional_details: Recently put in place are 2 speed warning camera’s that display your speed but this is not enough.
attributes.background: For years there has been safety issues with cars speeding along Norton Road causing concerns by St.Nicholas School, Bickerdikes Garden Centre and the Green Lane junction. Permanent speed enforcement camera’s need to be in place and a 20mph speed limit by the school.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
